   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(cth_log_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% @spec suite() -> Info
   29: %% Info = [tuple()]
   30: %% @end
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   34: 
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: %% @spec init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   37: %%     Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   38: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   39: %% Reason = term()
   40: %% @end
   41: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   43:     application:start(sasl),
   44:     do_log(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% @spec end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   49: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   50: %% @end
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     do_log(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   54:     application:stop(sasl),
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% @spec init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   59: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   60: %% TestCase = atom()
   61: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   62: %% Reason = term()
   63: %% @end
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% @spec end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   70: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
   71: %% TestCase = atom()
   72: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   73: %% Reason = term()
   74: %% @end
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   77:     ok.
   78: 
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: %% @spec groups() -> [Group]
   81: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   82: %% GroupName = atom()
   83: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   84: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   85: %% TestCase = atom()
   86: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   87: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   88: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
   89: %% N = integer() | forever
   90: %% @end
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: groups() ->
   93:     [{g1,[{repeat,10}],[tc1,tc2,tc3]}].
   94: 
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: %% @spec all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
   97: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   98: %% GroupName = atom()
   99: %% TestCase = atom()
  100: %% Reason = term()
  101: %% @end
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: all() -> 
  104:     [{group,g1}].
  105: 
  106: tc1(_) ->
  107:     do_log(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  108:     ok.
  109: tc2(_) ->
  110:     do_log(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  111:     ok.
  112: tc3(_) ->
  113:     do_log(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  114:     ok.
  115: 
  116: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  117: 
  118: 
  119: do_log(What) ->
  120:     ct:log("Logger ~p", [What]),
  121:     error_logger:error_report(What),
  122:     error_logger:info_report(What),
  123:     logger:notice("~p",[What]),
  124:     timer:sleep(100).
